content: original posting can be found on craftster 1 update 04/01/09 i recently discovered the yarn i originally crocheted this with it was warning some yarn snobs may cringe do not read further 1 skein of red heart classic which means the yardage was off yardage has been updated from 120 yards to 190 yards if you want a bigger poncho get two skeins 1 http //www craftster org/forum/index php topic=9791 0
